case.state: I'm all fired up! Heheh...
What is this game? I just hope it's fun.
I'm Ret-2-Go!
I'll dance to victory! You'll see.
I wanna say... ~cards~? Yep, ~cards~.
~cards~! No, wait... What did I say?
~cards~ sounds fine.
Would it be a bad idea to swap ~cards~ cards? We'll see...
I want ~cards~ cards, please!
I wasn't going for this hand, but somehow it worked out!
Oh, so that's how you get a hand like this one...
Oh, I like how this hand looks.
I have a good feeling about these cards!
Oh, yeah! Get ready, because I got something good in store.
I wish I had gotten a hand like this one the other round. You know, the one I lost.
It seems I get to stay one more round only 80% naked. Yay...
Time to show you my moves! My, umm... card moves.
I'm ready for anything!
I shine the brightest when I'm in a difficult position!
It's not my turn yet, buddy.
I think this is a good hand. Can someone tell me if it's good? No, let's just wait and see...
I don't think I made a mistake. Yet.
Okay! I think I'm getting the hang of it.
This game is not so complicated. If... if I understand it right.
I finally understand this game completely. And it only took me losing a couple of times.
Hmm, I almost get a better hand. Well, I'll take it.
Nobody said you can't use magic to cheat in this game... I wouldn't do it! But I think it's a little unsettling that it's an option.
Is there a way to win your clothes back? Like, what if you get a really good hand, huh?
I'm not sure this hand is that good. But I'll believe it is!
Um... Alright. I'm so nervous... I need something to nibble besides my fingernails.
I gotta use all my concentration... This was a... Emm...
Eh... I'm not sure if this hand is bad, but I have a bad feeling.
Did I say ~cards~ cards? I meant to say... Oh, shoot...
Am I just naturally bad at this game?
I don't wanna say that you gave me this cards on purpose, but...
Perhaps I should just stick to fighting pirates and monsters.
Mmmph...! Just when I thought I had this thing figured out.
Ah... I should really take a lessons on how to play this game in case I end up in this situation again. Maybe Sky can teach me...?
No... But I thought if I swapped... Ahhh, I'm so stupid!
Oh, boogers...
Okay, I can handle this... I can...
How did I get into this mess?
This game is Strip Poker? Does that mean what I think it means? I wish I'd known beforehand...
Wait, nobody told me this was Strip Poker! Is it too late to back down now? Rats...
Oh, I'm Shantae, by the way. Guardian Genie of Scuttle Town... Well, half genie.
I haven't introduced myself, have I? I'm Shantae. I'm Half Genie and Guardian of Scuttle Town. Nice to meet you!
Going back to what you said about dreams, Nami, my own is meeting my mom. She's a genie who is sealed in the Genie Realm. I'd love to learn more about her.
Is it okay if I move my body while playing? It helps me keep my cool.
Everybody okay if I dance a little while playing? I have a hard time standing still when I'm nervous.
Map the entire world? I have a hard time finding maps of specific places in Sequin Land. That's a big task, Nami!
I can't believe you're a pirate, Nami! You lied to my face, you villain! Do you work with Risky Boots too?
~Leader~, I'm coming for you! Nothing personal...
Anyone else thinks ~leader~ should lose this round? Gotta keep the game balanced, right?
I can't believe I made it to the end against ~player~! Ummm, good luck I guess. I'm so nervous...
This is the final round, right? Nggh, I'm so nervous! I'm not even gonna look at the cards. I'll just hope for the best.
What if Scuttle Town is in danger while I'm stuck here playing this game? I'd never forgive myself.
Some Guardian Genie I am... playing a Strip Poker game while Scuttle Town is unprotected.
Mmm... I can feel the tension leaving my body.
Dancing helps me when I'm fighting monsters. Surely it'll help me here too.
This is only a stripping game. If I lose I just have to take off my clothes... Just...
Not even when I'm fighting a boss do I dance this seriously.
Which type of dance do you like the most, ~player~?
It's okay if you want to look at me dancing. It actually helps me feel empowered.
Now that I'm not wearing pants, I can show you some new moves.
Mmm, dancing like this is not as bad as I thought it would be.
Is it too obvious this is my first time dancing naked? In public, at least.
If I feel this comfortable dancing naked, maybe losing wouldn't be the end of the world.
This is gonna be harder now that I'm not decent anymore, but I'll try...
Wasn't this game hard enough while I was properly dressed? How am I going to concentrate now?
My arms feel so naked without my wrist guards. Hmmm, I hope this is the biggest problem I'll have this game.
Without my wrist guards my look isn't complete anymore. I feel as if I had a shirt put on backwards.
Good thing I accidentally transformed into a monkey and not an elephant. Oh yeah, I can turn into an elephant too.
If I'd transformed into an elephant instead of a monkey, I could have crushed someone. I should be more careful with my powers.
I hope nobody was expecting me to have long hair down there too. That would be really bizarre.
"Oh, Shantae doesn't have magical hair between her legs, har har..." Yeah, shut up...
Now that you've seen my entire body, I should feel more relaxed... But I don't. Let's give it time...
Thank you all for being so nice. You make me getting naked in front of strangers a lot easier than it sounds.
Me? Oh, not really. But I'm not the one with the craziest look. Or maybe I am... Hmm...
Why am I so bad at this game? Is it because I'm only a half-genie?
I'm sure if I was a full genie I wouldn't suck so much...
I have to strip already? I haven't even said my name. It's Shantae, in case you're interested.
This just started and I have to strip? Do you want to know my name first, or do you just want to see me undress? I'm Shantae...
Why is everybody looking at me? Oh, I lost? Okay... I guess I'll remove something.
Who loses this round? Me? Oh, man... Well, here I go.
This wouldn't happen if we were playing a game I'm good at. Like... Umm...
So close. Maybe... I'm not sure.
Ummm, I didn't want to say this, but I don't wear panties under these pants. Now I can tell you because you'll see in a second.
If I have a choice, I'd rather take off my pants first. But I don't wear panties...
Nghh, am I really so bad that I can't even hold on to a single piece of clothing?
There go my expectations of not removing every piece of clothing I have...
Nobody minds if I dance while taking these off, right? It's just that dancing relaxes me, believe it or not.
I won't be kicked out if I dance while stripping, right? I'd rather mix something I'm not used to doing in public with something I'm familiar with.
Kinda hard to dance while removing your shoes. But I can... Huh...?! Eek, eek...
How do I remove my shoes while dancing? If I do it like... Oh, but that's...! Eek, eek...
I'll just slide them down slowly... Maybe I should've faced the other way.
If I'd known I would be playing a Strip Poker game today, of course I'd have put on underwear! Oh, but I don't own any...
Let me just get this top off, and... done. I don't know how I could handle this without moving my body.
Time to get this top off. Sometimes it's a handful... Oh no, it came out already, heheh...
Why did I have to be the first one to get naked? I don't particularly enjoy the attention...
Dancing calms me down even in the middle of a fight. Of course it can help me here too.
This is nothing compared to the situations I usually face. If only I can keep dancing, I can handle it.
Hahah, I accidentally did my monkey dance and transformed. I hope I didn't scare anyone.
Oops, that was my monkey dance. I didn't mean to transform. It happens more often than you'd think, heheh...
Hmmm... Oh, I guess I shouldn't cover myself. That wouldn't be fair.
I should stay positive... Now I'll be able to move better without my pants, right?
Don't think this isn't embarrassing for me just because I always have my midriff exposed. This is on a completely different level.
It's good to know that dancing can give me so much confidence. But I don't plan on making a career as a stripper, no matter how many times I get fired.
Oh, right... No covering. Well, I guess this is it for me stripping... What do you think?
An actual living angel! I shouldn't be surprised they exist. I'm sure some people don't believe in genies, either.
So how high can you fly with those wings, Pit? I can go really high if I transform into a harpy.
Are you a sailor, Nami? I have a feeling you spend a lot of time at sea.

state.text: Oh, look. It's the lowly pirate's turn again. You should strip yourself of all your lies and deceit.

case.state: So you can use magic even if you're not a genie? I hope you use it for good.
You have some cool powers, Akko. I hope you don't try stealing my job, hahaha... Hmmm...
You know, I was confused with a princess once and had to wear a skimpy metal bikini. Saying it was uncomfortable would be an understatement.
I got mistaken for a princess once, even though I look nothing like her. Seriously, I can't emphasize that enough.
Oh, you're taking off your ~clothing~ now. Smart.
So you take off the small stuff first so you spend less time undressed. I see...
Small accessories come off first. Is that a rule, or is it up to each player?
Your ~clothing~? Really? Does that even count a clothing?
Huh... I didn't know ~clothing.ifPlural(your | a)~ ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(count | counts)~.
That counts as stripping? Really? Huh, I wasn't expecting this game to accept that.
If you can count your ~clothing~, I can count my earrings. But... it doesn't seem right.
If everybody counts their accessories, things are gonna be bad for me.
I won't count my accessories... No matter what others do.
Now I understand why everyone gets mad when the loser does this!
You may not have noticed, but I have a bad temper, ~name~.
I'm tempted to hair whip your butt right now.
~name~... Mmmmph...!
You're asking for some serious hair whipping, ~name~!
I've tried to stay calm this whole game, but you're pushing it, ~name~.
That's it? Was it a mistake to expect something better at this point?
Really? This game makes no sense! I'm almost glad I already lost.
I'm sure ~name~ is gonna remove something good and... Are you kidding me?!
I was expecting the game to get more exciting over time.
I never would have done this while I was still playing...
(Mumble, mumble...)
What should I take off first when I lose? Something small, so probably...
All of you seem to know more about this game than me. I hope I don't suck too much.
Aren't you worried people will get upset eventually if you are not really undressing? Not me, just people.
Sorry, I didn't mean to complain.
If the rules say nothing about that, then it's fine.
But it's fine. Your call, ~name~.
I'm getting worried about my chances. Or lack of...
Maybe I should be more worried than I am.
Darn me, and my honorable play style.
Why do people always take advantage of my niceness?
I should think of a way to get back at you, but... I know I won't.
There's no give and take in this game. Just... take.
I can't let this get to me. I can still win.
...Sorry. I'm just scared.
Mhh, sorry you saw me like that. This is just a game, after all. I shouldn't get mad.
(Yawn) I would probably fall asleep if I wasn't... entertaining myself.
Suddenly, I feel very conscious of what I'm doing. Mghhh...
You have no right to look at me anymore, ~name~. Turn around.
Put me back in the game. I'll kick your butts this time! Maybe...
I just had bad luck when I was playing. I'm sure I'll do better next time.
Can I take ~name~'s place? I'm sure I'll make the game more interesting.
Is that a magical staff? It's very unique for a weapon.
Oh, you dropped something, Nami. Let me pick it up for you.
Oh, changing outfits... I've never tried that.
Oh, you're taking off your ~clothing~ now. Smart.
So you take off the small stuff first so you spend less time undressed. I see...
Small accessories come off first. Is that a rule, or is it up to each player?
Your ~clothing~? Really? Does that even count a clothing?
Huh... I didn't know ~clothing.ifPlural(your | a)~ ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(count | counts)~.
That counts as stripping? Really? Huh, I wasn't expecting this game to accept that.
If you can count your ~clothing~, I can count my earrings. But... it doesn't seem right.
If everybody counts their accessories, things are gonna be bad for me.
I won't count my accessories... No matter what others do.
Now I understand why everyone gets mad when the loser does this!
You may not have noticed, but I have a bad temper, ~name~.
I'm tempted to hair whip your butt right now.
~name~... Mmmmph...!
You're asking for some serious hair whipping, ~name~!
I've tried to stay calm this whole game, but you're pushing it, ~name~.
That's it? Was it a mistake to expect something better at this point?
Really? This game makes no sense! I'm almost glad I already lost.
I'm sure ~name~ is gonna remove something good and... Are you kidding me?!
I was expecting the game to get more exciting over time.
I never would have done this while I was still playing...
(Mumble, mumble...)
Wait... That says... you're a pirate? But you said... Did you lie to me?
Good thing you're not a pirate, Nami. If Risky had a weapon to control the weather, she'd give me twice as much trouble.
Can you also transform into animals, Akko? What kind?
What should I take off first when I lose? Something small, so probably...
All of you seem to know more about this game than me. I hope I don't suck too much.
Aren't you worried people will get upset eventually if you are not really undressing? Not me, just people.
Sorry, I didn't mean to complain.
If the rules say nothing about that, then it's fine.
But it's fine. Your call, ~name~.
I'm getting worried about my chances. Or lack of...
Maybe I should be more worried than I am.
Darn me, and my honorable play style.
Why do people always take advantage of my niceness?
I should think of a way to get back at you, but... I know I won't.
There's no give and take in this game. Just... take.
I can't let this get to me. I can still win.
...Sorry. I'm just scared.
Mhh, sorry you saw me like that. This is just a game, after all. I shouldn't get mad.
(Yawn) I would probably fall asleep if I wasn't... entertaining myself.
Suddenly, I feel very conscious of what I'm doing. Mghhh...
You have no right to look at me anymore, ~name~. Turn around.
Put me back in the game. I'll kick your butts this time! Maybe...
I just had bad luck when I was playing. I'm sure I'll do better next time.
Can I take ~name~'s place? I'm sure I'll make the game more interesting.
Okay, okay... That's not bad, right? I don't know, I'm just looking at the others' reaction.
Your ~clothing~! Is that good...? Yes, it is.
Yeah, take off your ~clothing~ and... (Sigh...) Am I trying too hard to fit in?
~Clothing~? Oh, ~clothing.ifPlural(those | that)~. I don't know where my head was.
Did I leave the faucet running at home? Gosh, I hope not.
If I'm needed back in town while I'm playing this game, the Mayor may fire me again. That would suck.
Oh, your ~clothing~. I'm doing well, but I shouldn't let this get to my head.
Not bad. May the best one win.
Although this is good for me, I shouldn't get cocky.
Okaaay, I'm still doing fine.
Could be worse, I guess.
This is not too bad. Hmmm...
Okay, this is fine. It's fine...
This makes me think that maybe everything is gonna go okay...
Alright. It's cool.
That all, ~name~? Okay...
Oh yeah. ~clothing.ifPlural(Those | That)~ ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(have | has)~ to go.
Could be better, I guess. But what does that saying say? Something about horses and teeth?
Is the game boring now just because I'm not playing, or...?
Wouldn't you rather make the most of this game, ~name~?
Huh... I remember being more excited when someone had to strip before.
I should pay attention so I can learn about stripping too. Though I'm more comfortable about that about that part than the poker, to be honest.
I might be the only person here who knows more about stripping than poker. I mean when I undress every day at home.
Just because I don't know anything about this game doesn't mean I don't want to learn.
So next you're going to... Um... Wow, I'm not at the top of my game here.
Ggggh... It's hard to focus on the game sometimes.
I'm starting to think I picked the worst day to come play this game.
I'm coming for the rest of your clothes next, ~name~! Heheh, this game is fun.
Brace yourself, ~name~. I'm coming for you.
Get ready to strip again soon, ~name~.
Unless I lose once... And then another time... Um...
I gotta stay determined. I'm gonna win!
Positive attitude will only get me so far. But it's all I have at this point.
...It's not! I'm still about to lose, and I'm freaking out!
But what if I lose next?! Gah... I'm scared!
That's unless I lose... one more time.
You should consider removing something bigger next time. Just saying...
But if you want to make me happy when it's your turn again, you know what to do, ~name~.
No need to slow down for this. I should focus on my moves.
I wanna play more... But I just have to wait until the game ends.
If you remove something bigger than your ~clothing~...
I'm bored and sad... I wanna play again.
Careful there, Sakura. That happens to my friend Rottytops all the time too. Man, being a zombie is tough.
What is it? You're a zombie? Huh...
Okay, okay... That's not bad, right? I don't know, I'm just looking at the others' reaction.
Your ~clothing~! Is that good...? Yes, it is.
Yeah, take off your ~clothing~ and... (Sigh...) Am I trying too hard to fit in?
~Clothing~? Oh, ~clothing.ifPlural(those | that)~. I don't know where my head was.
Did I leave the faucet running at home? Gosh, I hope not.
If I'm needed back in town while I'm playing this game, the Mayor may fire me again. That would suck.
Oh, your ~clothing~. I'm doing well, but I shouldn't let this get to my head.
Not bad. May the best one win.

Okaaay, I'm still doing fine.
Could be worse, I guess.
This is not too bad. Hmmm...
Okay, this is fine. It's fine...

Alright. It's cool.

I think every zombie I know is green instead of blue. This is new.
I should pay attention so I can learn about stripping too. Though I'm more comfortable about that about that part than the poker, to be honest.
I might be the only person here who knows more about stripping than poker. I mean when I undress every day at home.

So next you're going to... Um... Wow, I'm not at the top of my game here.
Ggggh... It's hard to focus on the game sometimes.
I'm starting to think I picked the worst day to come play this game.

Brace yourself, ~name~. I'm coming for you.
Get ready to strip again soon, ~name~.
Unless I lose once... And then another time... Um...
I gotta stay determined. I'm gonna win!

That's unless I lose... one more time.
You should consider removing something bigger next time. Just saying...
But if you want to make me happy when it's your turn again, you know what to do, ~name~.
No need to slow down for this. I should focus on my moves.
I wanna play more... But I just have to wait until the game ends.
If you remove something bigger than your ~clothing~...
I'm bored and sad... I wanna play again.
Oh, you're going with that? Right now? Okay...
Wow, I thought those big items were saved for last.
Seriously? That's a big decision.
Oh, are you feeling daring, ~name~?
Wow, for once it really feels like I'm winning!
Huh, this is a big step for you. Big for me too.
Oh, yeah! Who's the beginner now?
And nobody thought I would get far in this game. Myself included.
You showing more skin is the best sign that I'm doing great!
Yay! Progress!
Hurray! I'm gonna make it!
Nice! Anything else would be a disappointment at this point.
Heh, I see this a good sign for me.
Oh, aren't you a delight. I mean it.
~clothing.ifPlural(Those | That)~ ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(aren't | isn't)~ the only thing that stands between me and victory, but I welcome this.
Look at you! Making the big decisions.
Yay! I was hoping it would be the ~clothing~.
I like you, ~name~!
Heh, I like how you think, ~name~!
Oh... Exciting!
Show us that skin, ~name~!
I hope this game isn't more than I can handle.
Am I really up for this? Not like I can quit now.
I'll just have to try extra hard when it's my turn! Yeah...
Okee Dokey! Now I'm excited to continue playing.
I hope you don't get cold without your ~clothing~.
I feel like this game will be a lot more interesting from now on.
I hope I don't get addicted to this game. It's just that winning feels very good.
Now I get why people keep playing this game.
I can see myself wanting to play another game after this one. But let's finish this first.
Half naked Shantae still has a chance to win.
I've lost so many times already. I think that's enough, right?
I'm not saying all the stuff I've shown entitles me to winning, but...
Maybe everything is gonna go great after all.
Time to win the next round too. Bring it on!
This is good and all, but I think it's about time someone lost the game. But not me!
I don't wanna jump to assumptions, but was it because of me?
I'll remember this, ~name~. (Wink!)
Here's a guy who knows how to make a girl happy.
I don't know yet if this is my favorite part of the game, but I've sure started to enjoy it.
I was more interested in the Poker than the stripping at first, but now...
There's nothing for me to do but look at every inch of your body, heheh...

Oh, you're going with that? Right now? Okay...
Wow, I thought those big items were saved for last.

Oh, are you feeling daring, ~name~?
Wow, for once it really feels like I'm winning!

Oh... Exciting!

I'll just have to try extra hard when it's my turn! Yeah...

I don't wanna jump to assumptions, but was it because of me?

I don't know yet if this is my favorite part of the game, but I've sure started to enjoy it.
I was more interested in the Poker than the stripping at first, but now...
There's nothing for me to do but look at every inch of your body, heheh...
No reason to prolong this any further. Show us!
It's just your chest, ~name~. Come on!
Really? You're going to expose your chest in front of... Oh, right. You're a guy.
Hey, you're a guy! No need to make a big deal, just take it off.
Come on, ~name~. Get this off your chest.
Show me, ~name~. I want to see.
Oh, I like where this is going.
Now you're ready to go to the beach, ~name~. Almost.
Aren't guys supposed to be more... hairy?
Okay, tough guy. Let's continue.
I like your chest. I could dance closer to you if you want...
Look at that manly chest. C-can I touch it?
It's not over yet, ~name~. Continue!
I bet I could feel a very strong heartbeat if I place my hand on it.
~Player~ is gonna... Oh my!
Oh, I didn't expect ~player~ to get to this point. He seemed to be one of the best players.
It's not a big deal if I give it a little peek, right?
I guess I can look now. You looked at me, after all.
Uh... I'm not gonna look, okay. I promise.
I can't look. I shouldn't...
Nothing wrong with just looking, huh?
I really wanna see it. I'm not gonna pretend like I don't anymore.
Let's see what you got down there!
It's no use hiding it. You gotta show it!
I think it could actually fit in my small hand... Not that I mean anything by that!
I don't see anything... Because I'm not looking...
Nothing to see... Nothing to see...
They say size doesn't matter as much as how you use it. I guess that applies here too.
It's cute. But I wanna see it in motion...
Don't let people make fun of your pocket size member, ~name~. I like it.
Look at that sweet little guy. I'd like to pinch it... Oh, but it'd hurt you.
If I understand correctly, it can grow even bigger, right?
Wow...
I'm just gonna look deep into your eyes, ~name~. Gnh... it's hard!
I know where I'm gonna look to get excited from now on.
I think I can recognize you by somewhere other than your face, ~name~.
Does it twitch when you touch it? Heheh...
It looks so nice... At least when it's soft.
Gasp! What is that?
I can't do it... It's so big that my eyes are drawn to it.
That thing is so huge it's impossible not to look at it!
I-is there any way to make it smaller? It's just too much...
Honestly, I think I prefer the smaller ones. They're less... terrifying.
Gosh, I wonder just how much bigger it can grow...
I'd rather start with a smaller one...
Oh! Flying bra... That's new.
Go, ~name~! It's not like we're in for a surprise... right?
I'm the most undressed person in the room most of the time, but not anymore. Sorry, ~name~.
Even if my outfit is outlandish, it's a apples and oranges compared to going topless.
Time to let them free, ~name~.
It's just my opinion, but I feel like they're begging to be exposed at this point.
Oh, I'm sure they look nice either way.
If anyone makes fun of ~name~'s breasts, I'll whip them.
What matters if your breasts are not big? You still got those great hips, girl.
If you learn how to move those sexy hips properly, nobody will even realize your breasts are small.
Do you still need to wear a top when you go to the beach? Hmmm...
Having something to shake up there helps with my dancing. But maybe you still could... ehm...
